testcase.name: Validate Swiggy Application's Root Page Title
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user sees the title of the page........................................passed Then page title should be "Order food online from India's best food delivery service. Order from restaurants near you".passed

testcase.name: Validate the presence of Login and Sign up Link in the Root Page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user tries to see the login and sign in link...........................passed Then login and sign in link should be visible with the text "Login" and "Sign up".passed

testcase.name: Validate the presence of Delivery Location Text Box and Find Food Button in the Root Page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user tries to see delivery location text box & find food button........passed Then delivery location text box should be visible with placed holder value "Enter your delivery location".passed And find food button should be visible with the text "FIND FOOD"............passed

testcase.name: Validate the presence of Popular Cities in India information in the root page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user tries to see the information of popular <cities> in india.........passed Then user should be able to view the links with below city name.............passed

testcase.name: Enter and Choose Location For Finding Food in the root page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on root page of swiggy application............................passed When user enter the location "Kumbakonam" in the search text box............passed And user chooses the desired location "Kumbakonam Temples, Kanmani Devi Nagar, Kumbakonam, Tamil Nadu, India" from the drop down.passed Then User should be navigated to restaurants page with the url "https://www.swiggy.com/restaurants".passed
